NeckLVNeckExtentionH.name: Lever Neck Extension (plate loaded)
NeckLVNeckExtentionH.preparation: Sit on seat in machine. Place back of head under padded lever. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support.
NeckLVNeckExtentionH.execution: Move head back by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.
NeckLVNeckExtentionH.stabilizers: pectoralisminor, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, serratusanterior, pectoralissternal, deltoidanterior
